resources.string: 1. Select the statement that describes Machine learning
Machine learning is the study of machines
Machine learning is the use of data to make computers intelligent
Machine learning is the process of storing information in computers
Machine learning is the study of automation
2. Which of the following is not a type of algorithm used in machine learning
3. Machine learning is a sub-set of artificial intelligence.
4. Which of the fillowing images shows a decision tree?
